title: Practice Challenge

testCases.description: Displays the user name from fetchUser
Displays the posts count from fetchPosts

hints.text: async function with try/catch, await fetchUser, await fetchPosts

commonMistakes.consequence: Using await inside a non-async function causes a SyntaxError.
commonMistakes.correction: Mark the function as async: async function getData() { ... }

commonMistakes.consequence: Without await, you get a Promise object instead of the resolved value.
commonMistakes.correction: Add await before async calls: let data = await fetchData();
